metadata.title: CVE-2023-29544 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: If multiple instances of resource exhaustion occurred at the incorrecttime, the garbage collector could have caused memory corruption and apotentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox forAndroid < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
